translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度も何度も…………いやぁん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Over and over again... nooo

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、今はちょっと黙ってろ馬鹿剣……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S- Shut up for now, you stupid sword...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はー、はー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haa, haa...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーあ。壊されちゃったよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah man. It got destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、問題点は分かったし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, at least we figured out the problem...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕方ない、また新型作るか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh well, guess we'll have to make a new model...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待て貴様ーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Wait, you bastard---!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええい、追うぞ貴様ら！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, I'll chase you all down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、むり……むりです、っ……ランス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I- It's impossible... Impossible... Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなぼろぼろで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone's completely worn out...
Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬、逡巡した隙に、パイアールは姿を消していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the brief moment of hesitation, Paiarl vanished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち……まぁいいか……撤収だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch... Well, whatever... Retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス一行は撤退し、Mランドに帰還した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his party withdrew and returned to M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「科学力には科学力だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Science is the answer to science!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仁王立ちしたランスの背後には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Behind Rance, standing firm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザー達に運ばせた、パイアールの戦車の残骸。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were the remains of Paiarl's tank carried by Caesar and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、これより強い兵器を作るのだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So then, we’re going to make a weapon stronger than this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 解析しろ、マリア！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Analyze it, Maria!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、やってはみる……けど…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I- I'll try... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫だ！　お前なら出来る！　さあやれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'll be fine! You can do it! Now get to work!
Y- Yeah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんな奴と何度も正面から戦ってられん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't keep fighting someone like that head-on over and over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対抗策を練るのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to devise a countermeasure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信なさげな表情ながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though looking uncertain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアは真剣に戦車を解析し始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria began seriously analyzing the tank.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん……ん？　この材質、何……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Huh? What is this material...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄でもヒララ鉱石でも……あ、そっか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's neither iron nor Hirara ore... Ah, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: え、え、あれ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W- Wait, what...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何これ、どういう計算でやってるの……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this, how is it calculated...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんで普通の鉄でこんな複合装甲作れるの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H- How can they make such composite armor with normal iron...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、うーん、うーん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U- Ugh, ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、これコンピュータ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this a computer...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちで制御してるの……？　情報魔法で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it controlled from here...? Using information magic...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ううん……え、ここの処理は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... Wh- What about this process here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うん……弾もこんな作りで……あ、あれ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y- Yeah... The bullets are made like this too... H- huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしてヒララ鉱石、使ってないの……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be they aren't even using Hirara ore...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあなんで、こんな風に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then why is it like this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、堅っ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Wow, so tough...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、外せない……ネジもほとんど無い……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't dismantle this part... There are barely any screws...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ、マリア」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Maria?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理、よっ……こんなの、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's impossible... something like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホ！　出来んで済むか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Idiot! You can't just say it's impossible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るまでやれ、無能が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do it until you can, you incompetent!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、う、ううううぅぅぅ〜〜っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U- Ughhhhhhhh---...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （頑張ってるわよ……ランスのバカ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's doing her best... that idiot Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも……どうなってるのこれ、わかんない……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... I don't understand what's going on here...!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん……ん？　この材質、何……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Huh? What is this material...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄でもヒララ鉱石でも……あ、そっか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's neither iron nor Hirara ore... Ah, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: え、え、あれ……？

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何これ、どういう計算でやってるの……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this, how is it calculated...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんで普通の鉄でこんな複合装甲作れるの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H- How can they make such composite armor with normal iron...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、うーん、うーん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U- Ugh, ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちで制御してるの……？　情報魔法で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it controlled from here...? Using information magic...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ううん……え、ここの処理は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... Wh- What about this process here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うん……弾もこんな作りで……あ、あれ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y- Yeah... The bullets are made like this too... H- huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしてヒララ鉱石、使ってないの……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be they aren't even using Hirara ore...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあなんで、こんな風に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then why is it like this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、堅っ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Wow, so tough...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、外せない……ネジもほとんど無い……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't dismantle this part... There are barely any screws...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうだ、マリア」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Maria?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理、よっ……こんなの、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's impossible... something like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホ！　出来んで済むか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Idiot! You can't just say it's impossible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るまでやれ、無能が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do it until you can, you incompetent!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、う、ううううぅぅぅ〜〜っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U- Ughhhhhhhh---...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （頑張ってるわよ……ランスのバカ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's doing her best... that idiot Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも……どうなってるのこれ、わかんない……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... I don't understand what's going on here...!
